text:
"Singam 3" is a 2017 Indian Tamil-language action masala movie written and directed by Hari. A sequel to "Singam II" (2013) and the third movie in the "Singam" franchise, it stars Suriya, Anushka Shetty and Shruti Haasan in the lead roles. It is the fifth collaboration of Suriya and Hari.
Principal photography commenced in January 2016 in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh. The movie was released worldwide on 9 February 2017 along with the Telugu dubbed version, "Yamudu 3".
Box office.
Si3 film collected in domestic box office on its opening day and in 5 days of release. The film collected worldwide in 6 days.
Singam 3 final box-office was approximately 136 crores. And the film completed 100 days run and was declared "super hit".
